question: Where can one find more information about smoothing and alternative TF-IDF scoring methods?
response: For more information on smoothing techniques for Term Frequency-Inverse Document Frequency (TF-IDF) and alternative TF-IDF scoring methods, you can consult Chapter 3 of *Natural Language Processing in Action: Understanding, Analyzing, and Generating Text with Python*. Additional details can also be found in the Scikit-Learn Documentation available at [https://scikit-learn.org/stable/user_guide.html](https://scikit-learn.org/stable/user_guide.html) and the NLTK Corpora How-To at [https://www.nltk.org/howto/corpus.html](https://www.nltk.org/howto/corpus.html).
